svg.desc: Gridmapper, a simple tool to create dungeon maps

text.tspan: Use the mouse to draw the map.
Use d to draw a door. Use d again to rotate it.
Use s to draw a secret door. Use s again to rotate it.
Use c to draw a concealed door. Use c again to rotate it.
Use g to draw a big gate. Use g again to rotate it.
Use W to delete any kind of wall feature such as doors.
Use l to draw some stairs. Use l again to rotate the stairs.
Use L to delete the stairs.
Use t to draw a trap. Use t again to delete it.
Use u to undo. Use r to redo.
